verses.verse: For as <S%G1895>much<s%> as <S%G4183>many<s%> have <S%G2021>taken<s%> in <S%G2021>hand<s%> to <S%G392>set<s%> <S%G392>forth<s%> in <S%G1299>order<s%> a <S%G1335>declaration<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G4229>things<s%> which are most <S%G4135>surely<s%> <S%G4135>believed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> us,
<S%G2531>Even<s%> as they <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them to us, <S%G3588>which<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning<s%> were <S%G845>eyewitnesses,<s%> and <S%G5257>ministers<s%> of the <S%G3056>word;<s%>

It <S%G1380>seemed<s%> good to me <S%G2504>also,<s%> having had <S%G199>perfect<s%> <S%G3877>understanding<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> things from the very <S%G509>first,<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to you in <S%G2517>order,<s%> <S%G2903>most<s%> <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G2321>Theophilus,<s%>
That you might <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G803>certainty<s%> of those <S%G3056>things,<s%> <S%G4012>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you have been <S%G2727>instructed.<s%>

THERE was in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2197>Zacharias,<s%> of the <S%G2183>course<s%> of <S%G7>Abia:<s%> and his <S%G1135>wife<s%> was of the <S%G2364>daughters<s%> of <S%G2>Aaron,<s%> and her <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G1665>Elisabeth.<s%>

And they were <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4198>walking<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> and <S%G1345>ordinances<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G273>blameless.<s%>

And they <S%G1510>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5043>child,<s%> <S%G2530>because<s%> that <S%G1665>Elisabeth<s%> was <S%G4723>barren,<s%> and they <S%G297>both<s%> were now <S%G4260>well<s%> <S%G4260>stricken<s%> in <S%G2250>years.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G3588><s%> he <S%G2407>executed<s%> the <S%G2407>priest's<s%> <S%G2407>office<s%> <S%G1725>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G5010>order<s%> of his <S%G2183>course,<s%>

<S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G1485>custom<s%> of the <S%G2405>priest's<s%> <S%G2405>office,<s%> his <S%G2975>lot<s%> was to <S%G2370>burn<s%> <S%G2370>incense<s%> when he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
And the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> at the <S%G5610>time<s%> of <S%G2368>incense.<s%>

And there <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to him an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>side<s%> of the <S%G2379>altar<s%> of <S%G2368>incense.<s%>
And when <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, he was <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> and <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> on him.

But the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> not, <S%G2197>Zacharias:<s%> for your <S%G1162>prayer<s%> is <S%G1522>heard;<s%> and your <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G1665>Elisabeth<s%> shall <S%G1080>bear<s%> you a <S%G5207>son,<s%> and you shall <S%G2564>call<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2491>John.<s%>
And you shall <S%G2071>have<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> and <S%G20>gladness;<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> his <S%G1083>birth.<s%>

For he shall be <S%G3173>great<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and shall <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> <S%G4608>strong<s%> <S%G4608>drink;<s%> and he shall be <S%G4130>filled<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G2089>even<s%> from his <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb.<s%>
And <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> shall he <S%G1994>turn<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> their <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And he shall <S%G4281>go<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> him in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> and <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2243>Elias,<s%> to <S%G1994>turn<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of the <S%G3962>fathers<s%> to the <S%G5043>children,<s%> and the <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to the <S%G5428>wisdom<s%> of the <S%G1342>just;<s%> to <S%G2090>make<s%> <S%G2090>ready<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2680>prepared<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

And <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G2596>Whereby<s%> <S%G5101><s%> shall I <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5124>this?<s%> for I am an <S%G4246>old<s%> man, and my <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G4260>well<s%> <S%G4260>stricken<s%> in <S%G2250>years.<s%>

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1043>Gabriel,<s%> that <S%G3936>stand<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and am <S%G649>sent<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to you, and to <S%G2097>show<s%> you <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G2097>glad<s%> <S%G2097>tidings.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> you shall be <S%G4623>dumb,<s%> and not <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> that <S%G5023>these<s%> things shall be <S%G1096>performed,<s%> <S%G473>because<s%> <S%G3759><s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> not my <S%G3056>words,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> shall be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in their <S%G2540>season.<s%>
And the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G4328>waited<s%> for <S%G2197>Zacharias,<s%> and <S%G2296>marveled<s%> that he <S%G5549>tarried<s%> so long in the <S%G3485>temple.<s%>

And when he <S%G1831>came<s%> out, he <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G2980>speak<s%> to them: and they <S%G1921>perceived<s%> that he had <S%G3708>seen<s%> a <S%G3701>vision<s%> in the <S%G3485>temple:<s%> for he <S%G1269>beckoned<s%> to them, and <S%G1265>remained<s%> <S%G2974>speechless.<s%>
And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that, as soon as the <S%G2250>days<s%> of his <S%G3009>ministration<s%> were <S%G4130>accomplished,<s%> he <S%G565>departed<s%> to his own <S%G3624>house.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> his <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G1665>Elisabeth<s%> <S%G4815>conceived,<s%> and <S%G4032>hid<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G3779>Thus<s%> has the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4160>dealt<s%> with me in the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3739>wherein<s%> he <S%G1896>looked<s%> <S%G1896>on<s%> me, to <S%G851>take<s%> <S%G851>away<s%> my <S%G3681>reproach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

And in the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G3376>month<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1043>Gabriel<s%> was <S%G649>sent<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> to a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%>

To a <S%G3933>virgin<s%> <S%G3423>espoused<s%> to a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> of the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G1138>David;<s%> and the <S%G3933>virgin's<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G3137>Mary.<s%>

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in to her, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5463>Hail,<s%> you that are highly <S%G5487>favored,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is with you: <S%G2127>blessed<s%> are you <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1135>women.<s%>

And when she <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, she was <S%G1298>troubled<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> his <S%G3056>saying,<s%> and <S%G1260>cast<s%> in her mind <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G4217>manner<s%> of <S%G783>salutation<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> should be.
And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> not, <S%G3137>Mary:<s%> for you have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5485>favor<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> you shall <S%G4815>conceive<s%> in your <S%G1064>womb,<s%> and <S%G5088>bring<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son,<s%> and shall <S%G2564>call<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2424>JESUS.<s%>

He shall be <S%G3173>great,<s%> and shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G5310>Highest:<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G1325>give<s%> to him the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1138>David:<s%>
And he shall <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> for <S%G165>ever;<s%> and of his <S%G932>kingdom<s%> there shall be <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5056>end.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> to the <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> shall <S%G5124>this<s%> be, <S%G1893>seeing<s%> I <S%G1097>know<s%> not a <S%G435>man?<s%>

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, The <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> shall <S%G1904>come<s%> on you, and the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G5310>Highest<s%> shall <S%G1982>overshadow<s%> you: <S%G1352>therefore<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G40>holy<s%> thing which shall be <S%G1080>born<s%> of you shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> your <S%G4773>cousin<s%> <S%G1665>Elisabeth,<s%> she has <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4815>conceived<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> in her <S%G1094>old<s%> age: and <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G3376>month<s%> with her, <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4723>barren.<s%>
For with <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> shall be <S%G101>impossible.<s%>

And <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%> the <S%G1399>handmaid<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> be it to me <S%G2596>according<s%> to your <S%G4487>word.<s%> And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> from her.

And <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G450>arose<s%> in <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> and <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3714>hill<s%> country with <S%G4710>haste,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2448>Juda;<s%>
And <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2197>Zacharias,<s%> and <S%G782>saluted<s%> <S%G1665>Elisabeth.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that, <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G1665>Elisabeth<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G783>salutation<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> the <S%G1025>babe<s%> <S%G4640>leaped<s%> in her <S%G2836>womb;<s%> and <S%G1665>Elisabeth<s%> was <S%G4130>filled<s%> with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost:<s%>

And she <S%G400>spoke<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> are you <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1135>women,<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> is the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of your <S%G2836>womb.<s%>
And <S%G4159>what<s%> is <S%G5124>this<s%> to me, that the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of my <S%G2962>Lord<s%> should <S%G2064>come<s%> to me?

For, <S%G2400>see,<s%> as soon as the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of your <S%G783>salutation<s%> <S%G1096>sounded<s%> in <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> the <S%G1025>babe<s%> <S%G4640>leaped<s%> in my <S%G2836>womb<s%> for <S%G20>joy.<s%>
And <S%G3107>blessed<s%> is she that <S%G4100>believed:<s%> for there shall be a <S%G5050>performance<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> things which were <S%G2980>told<s%> her from the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
And <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> My <S%G5590>soul<s%> does <S%G3170>magnify<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>
And my <S%G4151>spirit<s%> has <S%G21>rejoiced<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> my <S%G4990>Savior.<s%>

For he has <S%G1914>regarded<s%> the <S%G5014>low<s%> estate of his <S%G1399>handmaiden:<s%> for, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> from now <S%G3568>on<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1074>generations<s%> shall <S%G3106>call<s%> me <S%G3106>blessed.<s%>
For he that is <S%G1415>mighty<s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> to me <S%G3167>great<s%> things; and <S%G40>holy<s%> is his <S%G3686>name.<s%>
And his <S%G1656>mercy<s%> is on them that <S%G5399>fear<s%> him from <S%G1074>generation<s%> to <S%G1074>generation.<s%>
He has <S%G4160>showed<s%> <S%G2904>strength<s%> with his <S%G1023>arm;<s%> he has <S%G1287>scattered<s%> the <S%G5244>proud<s%> in the <S%G1271>imagination<s%> of their <S%G2588>hearts.<s%>
He has <S%G2507>put<s%> <S%G2507>down<s%> the <S%G1413>mighty<s%> from their <S%G2362>seats,<s%> and <S%G5312>exalted<s%> them of <S%G5011>low<s%> <S%G5011>degree.<s%>
He has <S%G1705>filled<s%> the <S%G3983>hungry<s%> with <S%G18>good<s%> things; and the <S%G4147>rich<s%> he has <S%G1821>sent<s%> <S%G2756>empty<s%> <S%G1821>away.<s%>
He has <S%G482>helped<s%> his <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> in <S%G3415>remembrance<s%> of his <S%G1656>mercy;<s%>
As he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and to his <S%G4690>seed<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%>
And <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3306>stayed<s%> with her <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> to her own <S%G3624>house.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1665>Elisabeth's<s%> <S%G4130>full<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G4130>came<s%> that she should be <S%G5088>delivered;<s%> and she <S%G1080>brought<s%> <S%G1080>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son.<s%>

And her <S%G4040>neighbors<s%> and her <S%G4773>cousins<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G3170>showed<s%> <S%G3170>great<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> on her; and they <S%G4796>rejoiced<s%> with her.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G3590>eighth<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G4059>circumcise<s%> the <S%G3813>child;<s%> and they <S%G2564>called<s%> him <S%G2197>Zacharias,<s%> <S%G1909>after<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of his <S%G3962>father.<s%>
And his <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> Not so; but he shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2491>John.<s%>
And they <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, There is <S%G3762>none<s%> of your <S%G4772>kindred<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> by <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>
And they <S%G1770>made<s%> <S%G1770>signs<s%> to his <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G5101>how<s%> he <S%G2309>would<s%> have him <S%G2564>called.<s%>
